features.featureName: Service Credential and Secrets Support Integration and Storage in Azure Key Vault
features.featureDescription: Data plane supports native use of Azure Key Vault for credential and secrets store.
features.featureGuidance: Ensure that secrets and credentials are stored in secure locations such as Azure Key Vault, instead of embedding them into code or configuration files.
features.customerActionsDescription: Restrict the exposure of credential and secrets

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Machines should have secret findings resolved
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Audits virtual machines to detect whether they contain secret findings from the secret scanning solutions on your virtual machines.
